scripts.dev: npm run beforeBuild &&cross-env ENV_SCHEMA=http vuepress dev docs/.
scripts.devHttps: npm run beforeBuild && cross-env ENV_SCHEMA=https vuepress dev docs/.
scripts.build: npm run beforeBuild && rm -rf docs/.vuepress/dist && vuepress build docs/.
scripts.onestep: npm run build && npm run compress && npm run upload && npm run deploy
scripts.beforeBuild: npm run addCatelog && npm run addTJ && npm run addConfig
